room_title: Escape room "Cat Lady" by Mad Genius Escapes in Portland
review: The Cat Lady room is so much fun. The story, the staging, and the puzzles all so clever and creative. This is a wonderfully entertaining experience. Fun lovers should flock to Mad Genius Escapes!

room_title: Escape room "Cat Lady" by Mad Genius Escapes in Portland
review: We had a group of 6 in the Crazy Cat Lady Room. It was such a great experience. We got so close!

room_title: Escape room "Cat Lady" by Mad Genius Escapes in Portland
review: Loved the "Cat Lady" room. Hilarious details and puzzles that worked well and made sense. Lots of stuff to do for 6-8 people, but totally doable for 4 puzzle-lovers. Book it!

room_title: Escape room "Cat Lady" by Mad Genius Escapes in Portland
review: My sister-in-law had an awesome time helping the crazy cat lady. The room was so fun and creative. I will definitely be returning for their other rooms! The crazy cat lady was the co-owner and she is super great! I highly recommend this for an hour of fun! Worth every penny!

room_title: Escape room "Cat Lady" by Mad Genius Escapes in Portland
review: We had such a blast! Creative and challenging puzzles, super friendly staff, and Katie was the perfect crazy cat lady! We solved the cat lady mystery and will 100% be back to do the other two rooms! Canâ€™t recommend this place enough.
